Name: Gold Star Pizza
AttributesDescription: Increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 50% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: Now available at Trattoria Margherita in Ragunna City, a new pizza said to come from the distant land of Huanglong. With a unique topping of beef, pineapple, durian, and cheese, this pizza delivers a flavor that surprises and lingers. As fans of this bold combo always say, "It hits like a wave!"
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus of all Resonators in the team by 25% for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
